verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: Amid the visit of French President Emmanuel Macron to the White House on Tuesday] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: had] [ARG1: time to weigh in on Ohio politics] .
Amid the visit of French President Emmanuel Macron to the White House on Tuesday , President Trump had [ARGM-TMP: time] to [V: weigh] in [ARG1: on Ohio politics] .
